介绍

Makedown安装生成器类型

控件

Input 输入框Input Number 数字输入框Select 选择器TreeSelect 树形选择Cascader 级联选择器Radio 单选框Checkbox 多选框DateTime 日期、时间选择器Switch 开关Upload 上传Txt 文本Slot 自定义插槽

表单

典型表单行内表单对齐方式与尺寸控制校验表单自定义校验表单添加/删除表单项弹窗表单搜索表单

表格

基础表格不带斑马纹表格带边框表格带状态表格固定表头固定列多级表头单选多选排序格式化自定义列模板展开行树形数据与懒加载表尾合计行合并行或列自定义索引

Table of Contents for current page

Switch 开关 #

基础用法
尺寸
文字描述
Pay by year
Pay by month
显示自定义图标
扩展的value类型
禁用状态
加载状态
阻止切换
点击查看代码
vue
<template>
  <FormGenerator :model="form" :formOption="formOption" />
</template>

<script lang="tsx" setup>
import { FormGenerator } from 'element-plus-generator'
import type { formOption } from 'element-plus-generator/dist/type'
import { ref } from 'vue';
import { Check, Close } from '@element-plus/icons-vue'

let form = ref({})
let loading = ref(false)
let formOption = ref<formOption[]>([
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key1',
      label: '基础用法',
    },
  },
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key2',
      label: '尺寸',
    },
    control: {
      size: 'large'
    }
  },
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key3',
      label: '文字描述',
    },
    control: {
      activeText: "Pay by month",
      inactiveText: "Pay by year"
    }
  },
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key4',
      label: '显示自定义图标',
      labelWidth: '120'
    },
    control: {
      activeIcon: Check,
      inactiveIcon: Close
    }
  },
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key5',
      label: '扩展的value类型',
      labelWidth: '120'
    },
    control: {
      activeValue: "100",
      inactiveValue: "0"
    }
  },
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key6',
      label: '禁用状态',
    },
    control: {
      disabled: true
    }
  },
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key7',
      label: '加载状态',
    },
    control: {
      loading: true
    }
  },
  {
    type: 'switch',
    formItem: {
      prop: 'key8',
      label: '阻止切换',
    },
    control: {
      loading: loading.value,
      beforeChange: beforeChange
    }
  },
])

function beforeChange() {
  // loading.value = true
  return new Promise((resolve) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
      loading.value = false
      return resolve(true)
    }, 1000)
  })
}
</script>
